display_long_description:
**Become part of an elite special forces unit in Tactical Assault VR!**

• Habie147 - ‘Tactical Assault Is One Of The Best Hardcore Shooters I’ve Played’

• Gamertag VR - ‘The Best Tactical VR FPS On Quest’

• Controlled Pairs - ‘The Best CQB Game I've Ever Played’

Tactical Assault VR is an intense tactical shooter where you use real-world CQB (Close Quarters Battles) tactics to stack up, breach doors and eliminate threats. Play solo or join an online co-op special forces unit in missions around the world.

# Features
**PvE Missions: Solo or Online Multiplayer Co-Op with Up to 6 Players**
[media]

**PvP: Competitive Online Multiplayer**
[media]

**7 Non-Linear, Asymmetrical Maps**

Plan your assault. The choice is yours.
[media]

**Game Mode Variety**

Bomb Defusal, Hostage Rescue, High-Value Target (HVT) Eliminations, Mini Games, Room Randomizer Killhouse
[media]

**30+ Detailed Weapons and Counting**

Customize your loadout with tactical gear including vests, helmets, weapons, scopes, sights, grips and breaching equipment.
[media]
